name: Slime Survivor (Rhewid)
description:
The Slime invasion started and only you can save your friends.

Use your special attack powers to delay the inevitable invasion of slimes and buy your friends enough time to flee!

If you could only destroy the Slime King…

Controls:

Movement: WASD 
Attack : F | LEFT MOUSECLICK
Dash: SPACE | SHIFT
Menu : E | ESC | ENTER
